code: import{createAsyncThunk}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export const Login=createAsyncThunk('userData/Login',async obj=>{const params=new URLSearchParams({username:obj.username,password:obj.password,action:obj.action});const response=await fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_PY_SERVER,"/manageUsers?").concat(params.toString()),{method:'GET',headers:{'Accept':'application/json'}});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response was not ok');}const data=await response.json();return data;});
